post:
**Company name:** No Uptime

**Introduction:**
Since 2016 No Uptime has been providing reliable, scalable and secure VPS hosting solutions for individuals and businesses of all sizes. We pride ourselves on solid network reliability and responsive 24/7 superhuman support.

High Quality Hardware - All our servers are powered by the latest generation of Intel processors with the maximum amount of RAM memory.

Maximum Performance - Our VPS platform is designed to provide security and speed without compromise. All this leads to a better user experience.

**Website address:** [www.nouptime.host](https://nouptime.host)

**Payment methods:**

- Visa, MasterCard, and American Express
- PayPal has to be requested via ticket.

**All our VPS are powered by SSD  - Faster Disks!**

**DataCenter Location & Test Files**

- Datacenter Name - Miami, Florida
- Test IPv4: 45.58.127.2
- Test file: http://45.58.127.2/100MB-test.bin

**VPS Packages include:**

- Instant Setup
- 1 Gbps Uplink Port Speed
- Windows & Linux distro’s
- 24/7/365 No Uptime Superhuman Support via Helpdesk

**Our Host Node Specifications**

- CPU 6700K
- 64 GB RAM
- 4 x 1 TB SSD
- Hardware RAID 10
- 1 Gbps Port


**VPS Plan ( No Uptime VPS P1 )**

- 1.5 GB DDR4 RAM
- 1x vCPU
- 30 GB SSD Disk space
- 1.5 TB Transfer
- 1Gbps uplink
- 1x IPv4
- Virtualizor/KVM
- $10/month ( After discount the price would be **$5/mo** )
- [**Order link**](https://nouptime.host/clientportal/cart.php?a=add&pid=1)

- CentOS
- SuSE
- Scientific
- Fedora
- Debian
- Ubuntu
- Windows Server 2008 R2
- Windows Server 2012 R2 *Being added.
- Windows Server 2016 *Being added.


**COUPON CODE**

Use the coupon code **FIRST200** to get **_50% discount for LIFETIME_**


**Don't see what you need? [Open a ticket](https://nouptime.host/clientportal/submitticket.php?step=2&deptid=1) for a custom quote!**
